spell.name: Ego Whip
entries: 你鞭打范围内你能看到的一个生物的头脑，使其充满绝望。目标必须在智力救赎上成功，否则在攻击卷、能力检查和救赎上处于劣势，而且不能施法。在它的每个回合结束时，目标可以再做一次智力自救。如果成功，该咒语将在目标身上结束。

spell.name: Id Insinuation
entries: 你会在你能看到的范围内的一个生物的头脑中释放出一股相互冲突的欲望洪流，削弱它做出决定的能力。目标必须在智慧蓄力中成功，否则就会丧失能力。在每个回合结束时，它都会受到 {@damage 1d12} 精神伤害，然后可以再做一次智慧蓄力。如果成功，目标身上的咒语就会结束。

spell.name: Intellect Fortress
entries: 你在自己周围创造了一个微弱的、闪烁着保护性精神力量的屏障。在持续时间内，你在所有的救赎动作上都有优势。
当另一个你能看到的在你30英尺范围内的生物的蓄力失败时，你可以使用你的反应来让他们重新进行蓄力。他们必须使用新的投掷。

spell.name: Mental Barrier

time.condition: which you take when you are forced to make an Intelligence, a Wisdom, or a Charisma saving throw

entries: 你用一堵循环的、重复的思想墙来保护你的头脑。直到你下一回合开始，你在智力、智慧和魅力方面都有优势，并且对精神伤害有抵抗力。

spell.name: Mind Sliver
entries: You drive a disorienting spike of psychic energy into the mind of one creature you can see within range. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. Unless the saving throw is successful, the target takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage, and the first time it makes a saving throw before the end of your next turn, it must roll a {@dice d4} and subtract the number rolled from the save.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach certain levels: 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).

spell.name: Mind Thrust
entries: You propel a lance of psionic disruption into the mind of one creature you can see within range. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 3d6} psychic damage, and it can use its action only to {@action Dash} or {@action Disengage} on its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and this spell doesn't limit its action options.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 当你使用3级或更高等级的法术槽施放此法术时，你可以针对2级以上的每一个法术槽的一个额外生物。当你瞄准它们时，这些生物必须在30英尺范围内。

spell.name: Psionic Blast
entries: You unleash a destructive wave of mental power in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 5d8} force damage, is pushed 20 feet directly away from you, and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't pushed or knocked prone.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Psychic Crush
entries: You overload the mind of one creature you can see within range, filling its psyche with discordant emotions. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 12d6} psychic damage and is {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.
被眩晕的目标可以在其每个回合结束时做一个智力救赎动作。拯救成功后，该法术在目标身上结束。

spell.name: Thought Shield
entries: 你在你所接触的一个生物的心灵上编织了一层混浊的面纱。在持续时间内，目标的思想无法被读取或探测，除非目标允许，否则生物无法与目标进行心灵感应，而且目标在对抗任何可以确定其是否说实话的效果时具有优势。
